page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE by SIOBHAN
page.content:
I usually get up at 7.00 and am dressed at half past seven. I go to school at 8.30. When we get to school we play for a little while. At 9.00 we start school. When we get in, we go into Mrs. Wadsworths room for assembly. Then we go into our classroom and do some work. We write stories and do number games. At 10.40 it is playtime. Playtime finishes at 10.55 and we usually do sums and at 12.00 we have our dinner. After dinner we have another playtime which finishes at 1.15. In the afternoon we paint, have poems, make things and choose. We finish at 3.30 and go home to tea. I play outdoors on my bike or read a book. I like Enid Blyton stories. At 7.00 I go to bed.
Siobhan Age 7
